
---
title: '抖音直播带货，趣店罗老板除了付费，靠直播切片也能免费引流'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - 鸟哥笔记
 - 首页

---

<div>   
<div style="height: 6px"></div>
                        <p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;"><span style="font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;">昨天晚上，做<a href="https://www.niaogebiji.com/tag/%E6%8A%96%E9%9F%B3%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%E5%B8%A6%E8%B4%A7" target="_blank">抖音直播带货</a>的朋友们都被<a href="https://www.niaogebiji.com/tag/%E8%B6%A3%E5%BA%97" target="_blank">趣店</a>的直播间刷屏了。从各个群里到朋友圈里，大家都在争相晒着各种截图，感慨资本的疯狂。</span></p>
<div data-page-id="doxcnSR2AVT62K0EChn7OoAtEDh" data-docx-has-block-data="true">
<p class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-doxcnmi2M0GMgUUiKutNZcWrgtb" style="text-align: inherit; background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"e596d703-b0f9-4a3d-905a-c13138b868b6","height":681,"width":1636,"currheight":681,"currwidth":1636,"natrualheight":681,"natrualwidth":1636,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcny66m2bym2yllem3uyx7vkg%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnmi2m0gmguuikutnzcwrgtb%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcny66m2bym2yllem3uyx7vkg","image_type":"image png","size":283505,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDJiMmQ3M2ZkZmRmYmQ5MWZhNTdlNjQzN2I0OTU0OGZfYkJyY2VqOTVFV1BrRW9MOGFhU2R0UFR1NjZnQXM1bWhfVG9rZW46Ym94Y255NjZNMkJ5TTJ5TExFTTNVWXg3dmtnXzE2NTg0NzIyOTA6MTY1ODQ3NTg5MF9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcny66M2ByM2yLLEM3UYx7vkg/?mount_node_token=doxcnmi2M0GMgUUiKutNZcWrgtb&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1636" data-height="681" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-doxcnGSMMciuO6ocMYP2HuYgAQg" style="text-align: inherit; background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"39551e57-b478-4ff4-900b-3fad3fec5288","height":492,"width":1640,"currheight":492,"currwidth":1640,"natrualheight":492,"natrualwidth":1640,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcnxhwg9f2annqfaua7bsmuvc%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcngsmmciuo6ocmyp2huygaqg%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcnxhwg9f2annqfaua7bsmuvc","image_type":"image png","size":195116,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZWIxOTg3NDJhNzgyYjcwYzU1NmU5ZmU3YzBjMzgwNDJfeGhtWjYyUHBoWUszTGhuYWp3REF3WXBKb3Zyd1pwQWFfVG9rZW46Ym94Y25YaHdnOUYyYW5ucWZhdUE3QlNtVVZjXzE2NTg0NzIyOTA6MTY1ODQ3NTg5MF9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcnXhwg9F2annqfauA7BSmUVc/?mount_node_token=doxcnGSMMciuO6ocMYP2HuYgAQg&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1640" data-height="492" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnie8AiGckas44e6ioCT3Eff" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">总结一下，7.17号"趣店罗老板"这个抖音账号共直播19小时，销售额破2.5亿，此次直播一共破了几个记录：</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnuWiqEoGcK2Y2CKdUNZwVPf" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">单场销量记录：800万+</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnKIOceOsAEeaiGO7n36EJCc" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">单场涨粉记录：450万+</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnU88kEeq6k6A0KUgdpZGtBd" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">单场点赞记录：5亿+</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcneqACWsa2u8MQQP2gPDs19f" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">单场场观记录：9000万+</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnMCAyg8mgKuaAMiouUrbOpb" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">单场投放记录：2亿+</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnQ0k204mk22g0WKAiFzwUFf" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;"><strong>朋友圈的反应有以下几种：</strong></p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnES8uewUqAkgIA1675DxpNc" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">1.晒出自己1分钱抢到的菜品订单，以示参与感。</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnsOwmUw6CmqiqkrO1NoBlRh" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">2.感慨趣店一战封神，直呼资本牛逼，虽迟但到。</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnsyS04meKEIUUWQLKelPQ6g" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">3.感到无助弱小，对资本入场挤压普通人的生存空间感到担忧。</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnoyyecC8YYwGIUjfYLAHg1d" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">4.扒出趣店和罗老板黑历史，痛斥指摘。</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnscI80SCm4Oggxg2aU1C5Bl" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">我们就谈谈作为一个普通的抖音电商从业者，这件事对我们的影响和启发。</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcno6KIM6KcmaqYmQO4EAiL9d" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">今晚大家的感受之所以这么强烈，甚至很多人被刺痛，</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcncY2SQMkm0qom6Sj2TBS3DM" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">都是因为亲眼看到在资本的助推下，一夜破圈竟然如此容易，流量竟然可以这么集中的输出灌溉。</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnqyGWUGIeyuKikVt6mbeI6e" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">在一场直播之后，800 万用户的家里即将收到抖音直播间 1 分钱包邮购买的酸菜鱼、粉蒸肉等<a href="https://www.niaogebiji.com/tag/%E9%A2%84%E5%88%B6%E8%8F%9C" target="_blank">预制菜</a>，这个 6 月初才开播带货的抖音账号也将获得铺天盖地的讨论和关注。接下来的一个月，从趣店直播间到股票市场的每一次变化都将继续成为大家的谈资。</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnG6ss0wAkqWK8Ox3j9aKf6C" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">今天在群里有个讨论：抖音电商大盘付费流量的占比有多少？这个数字可能只有百分之十几，还不到百分之二十。是不是超出大家的想象，因为在很多人的印象里，直播间不投钱就没流量。很多人也以为今天趣店的直播间就是拿钱砸出来的。这当然没错，但是除了花钱买流量，这个直播间的内容和产品也是天花板级的：全场 1000 多台苹果手机（福袋每5分钟就有 5 个苹果手机）贡献的停留时常和加粉率，百万份的 1 分钱预制菜贡献的商点率和转化率，明星贾乃亮贡献的曝光点击率，</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnqq606geMGIaola7OrXLyou" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">趣店的直播间除了来自资本的投流之外，还有的就是账号数十条直播间切片贡献的短视频引流直播间的 gpm,这些操作撬动的自然流量肯定也是天花板级的。群里有人估算，9000 万场观里至少有一半是免费的。</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnAAmYKSQ8gyCwe6NGC8C1Nc" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;"><span style="color: #8f959e;">虽然很少直播间能够像趣店一样投放这种等级的付费流量，但可以像趣店学习的是发布视频，为直播间导流短视频流量。品牌商家已经感觉到短视频权重正逐渐增加，所以最近很多品牌方直播前和直播中</span>发布更多的视频来引流<span style="color: #8f959e;">。</span></p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnIYw28Q6K8OqGcr8EPJllIb" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">那发什么视频引流效果最好呢？<span style="color: #d83931;">建议可以发直播切片</span>，因为这类视频背景、人物包括话术和直播间感觉接近，用户更容易被吸引进入直播。</p>
<p class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-doxcngEM2cOsyKmgSmAQbkCZ2Ac" style="text-align: inherit; background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"6ed54956-6665-45a2-bca6-b2365c32ed22","height":401,"width":937,"currheight":401,"currwidth":937,"natrualheight":401,"natrualwidth":937,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcnk20gwhojstlpyp2bzp4ize%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcngem2cosykmgsmaqbkcz2ac%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcnk20gwhojstlpyp2bzp4ize","image_type":"image png","size":37302,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YjU3N2EzNmU0YTEyZmU1NzA3MGExZjY3NDNkNzk4N2JfSHZJRTVOV0FSYkU5TlJXVFJxRHkyNExqUDNMQmhERUdfVG9rZW46Ym94Y25rMjBnV2hPanN0THBZcDJiWnA0aXplXzE2NTg0NzIyOTA6MTY1ODQ3NTg5MF9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcnk20gWhOjstLpYp2bZp4ize/?mount_node_token=doxcngEM2cOsyKmgSmAQbkCZ2Ac&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="937" data-height="401" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcn8aGCSWs08gEwUPd9Dp5u3g" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">头部直播间一般选择留存率高或互动高的片段做切片引流，比如下面时段1，留存率很高，直播内容互动性很强，就可以在直播中，通过飞瓜智投的【录像】<span style="color: #d83931;"><strong>实时下载该时段内的直播高清录像</strong></span>，作为素材二次剪辑，制作切片视频。</p>
<p class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-doxcnYuScI42kiGqqsXCTrAVCpJ" style="text-align: inherit; background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"c17b67b2-3649-435b-a67a-46e25ab5d05a","height":342,"width":1080,"currheight":342,"currwidth":1080,"natrualheight":342,"natrualwidth":1080,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcn4dpzigq9jvddcq8qbb53yf%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnyusci42kigqqsxctravcpj%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcn4dpzigq9jvddcq8qbb53yf","image_type":"image png","size":210341,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTkxZDA4NGFjNDE4NTI1ODhjN2Q4MDQ3MDRhMGRmYjVfMlV0QTFOUlBhYm9aRlFXSW95a2dzRlBZUWpwbEJzZGNfVG9rZW46Ym94Y240ZHB6SUdROUpWZERDUThxQmI1M1lmXzE2NTg0NzIyOTA6MTY1ODQ3NTg5MF9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcn4dpzIGQ9JVdDCQ8qBb53Yf/?mount_node_token=doxcnYuScI42kiGqqsXCTrAVCpJ&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1080" data-height="342" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h4 class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcn0MQquwmiYEEAGCo2OEIG0d" style="text-align: center; background-image: none; font-size: 14px; color: #818386; font-weight: 300; line-height: 30px; margin: 25px 0px;"><span style="color: #8f959e;">（数据来源：飞瓜智投控制台，已获客户授权并脱敏）</span></h4>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcn6oEMSKuaMyCwWErph2Gteh" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;"><span style="color: #8f959e;">随着直播间短视频流量增加，越来越多的短视频都在给直播间的时候，我们很难知道现在直播间是哪一条视频在引流？去加热视频？</span></p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnw0yM6sMCskeu0Es1xgEo5e" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">想要知道具体是哪条视频在给当前时段的直播间引流，就需要<span style="color: #8f959e;">单独查看每条视频的当前时间段引流人数，</span><strong>了解近5分钟进场的观众是哪一条视频引入的</strong><span style="color: #8f959e;">，就能快速调整讲品或加热视频。</span></p>
<p class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-doxcnYAqyE0G2CgesqOgMC2ylpd" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"a4f33c2b-7bbb-4bb2-9179-f30117b6fd9d","height":643,"width":849,"currheight":643,"currwidth":849,"natrualheight":643,"natrualwidth":849,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcngexbhtr9gynydeqxo7pcge%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnyaqye0g2cgesqogmc2ylpd%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcngexbhtr9gynydeqxo7pcge","image_type":"image png","size":196380,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjZlZTE5N2QxNWJlNGIzODI5ZmM3NjVkMDIwYmVlYWFfRHpSNmxUd2JVZ0NlRk5naU44cFNjUFJvZWJDWGd0M2VfVG9rZW46Ym94Y25nZVhCaFRyOWd5bnlEZVFYbzdwQ2dlXzE2NTg0NzIyOTA6MTY1ODQ3NTg5MF9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcngeXBhTr9gynyDeQXo7pCge/?mount_node_token=doxcnYAqyE0G2CgesqOgMC2ylpd&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="849" data-height="643" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h4 class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnw2um2yqKQ0oQeECLuRvIbh" style="text-align: center; background-image: none; font-size: 14px; color: #818386; font-weight: 300; line-height: 30px; margin: 25px 0px;"><span style="color: #8f959e;">（数据来源：果集·飞瓜智投实时引流，数据已脱敏并授权）</span></h4>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcneoYOmsWOkcqcaWYzG8q0ef" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;"><span style="color: #8f959e;">比如下面这个直播间，从短视频列表看视频1的引流人数是最多的。</span></p>
<p class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-doxcngIO2Q2EQeCAAkFJdP3iorh" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"eeb3ac2e-7c53-44c7-926a-f8b7209dbb6b","height":511,"width":1080,"currheight":511,"currwidth":1080,"natrualheight":511,"natrualwidth":1080,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcn4bdxm31k2xbe8f6evbkdnh%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcngio2q2eqecaakfjdp3iorh%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcn4bdxm31k2xbe8f6evbkdnh","image_type":"image png","size":79307,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Mzg3MWRiMWM4MmI1Yjc1ZjhiYjcwNGU2N2YwM2U0ODhfRmRqRk9wbkRGck1iVWJXOEJtd1FsbkZXWklJWVJyTmpfVG9rZW46Ym94Y240QkR4bTMxSzJ4YmU4RjZFVmJLZG5oXzE2NTg0NzIyOTA6MTY1ODQ3NTg5MF9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcn4BDxm31K2xbe8F6EVbKdnh/?mount_node_token=doxcngIO2Q2EQeCAAkFJdP3iorh&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1080" data-height="511" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h4 class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnEYkc86u0Sm6mmACie6Lolc" style="text-align: center; background-image: none; font-size: 14px; color: #818386; font-weight: 300; line-height: 30px; margin: 25px 0px;"><span style="color: #8f959e;">（数据来源：果集·飞瓜智投实时引流，数据已脱敏并授权）</span></h4>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnKei62uasEkowuShuBeeohf" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;"><span style="color: #8f959e;">但是从【实时引流排行】可以看到视频1的引流人数在逐渐下降，直播间目前近30分钟内是视频2的引流人数最多，所以当前直播间引流观众更多的是来自视频2。</span></p>
<p class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-doxcnwCYKwsqCuiEgWEOMWC2BFb" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"ed714b36-52bb-4a4b-9486-74961d53650d","height":636,"width":1080,"currheight":636,"currwidth":1080,"natrualheight":636,"natrualwidth":1080,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcnqqnypjvhtqdhhqbcgai2ef%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnwcykwsqcuiegweomwc2bfb%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcnqqnypjvhtqdhhqbcgai2ef","image_type":"image png","size":251447,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWJiN2U0NWY5MDllYjUzYTUzMWM4YzA0MzdiOGQ3ZDVfd2lLY1ZvRXk1SUpOaUF2ODlKVWd6WEJOOHNsYVpYQzlfVG9rZW46Ym94Y25RcU5ZcEp2SHRRREhoUUJDZ2FpMkVmXzE2NTg0NzIyOTA6MTY1ODQ3NTg5MF9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcnQqNYpJvHtQDHhQBCgai2Ef/?mount_node_token=doxcnwCYKwsqCuiEgWEOMWC2BFb&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1080" data-height="636" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h4 class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnqECGoqsiCCCOGMBKxQJSmh" style="text-align: center; background-image: none; font-size: 14px; color: #818386; font-weight: 300; line-height: 30px; margin: 25px 0px;"><span style="color: #8f959e;">（数据来源：果集·飞瓜智投实时引流，数据已脱敏并授权）</span></h4>
<p class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-doxcnocwO68e2UueUTZeKgQ1StB" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"e9bf421e-211d-40f0-8e59-349667db2535","height":625,"width":1080,"currheight":625,"currwidth":1080,"natrualheight":625,"natrualwidth":1080,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcnpsil6whamkposszwaoirws%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnocwo68e2uueutzekgq1stb%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcnpsil6whamkposszwaoirws","image_type":"image png","size":230408,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NGQ2NjAyODY1MDc1MzJjMzliMGI0YjNjMjU2MjFhYTJfZml6U0MwNjRmZE5VUmZSOHdWNkpCdEpXWndnaGw0Y3NfVG9rZW46Ym94Y25QU0lMNndIYU1LcE9zc3p3YU9JcldTXzE2NTg0NzIyOTA6MTY1ODQ3NTg5MF9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcnPSIL6wHaMKpOsszwaOIrWS/?mount_node_token=doxcnocwO68e2UueUTZeKgQ1StB&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1080" data-height="625" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h4 class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnEik2wC0S8oUSMf1JAJ4WBc" style="text-align: center; background-image: none; font-size: 14px; color: #818386; font-weight: 300; line-height: 30px; margin: 25px 0px;"><span style="color: #8f959e;">（数据来源：果集·飞瓜智投实时引流，数据已脱敏并授权）</span></h4>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcngaWKSmqgSEAey2B1F1cvTg" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">今晚的案例，一定会被无数自媒体人总结为"用金钱换时间"。他们说，你看趣店一夜烧出了用户认知、品牌曝光、消费习惯和资本信心。如果你真的傻傻相信这个，可能要吃大亏，因为并不是所有的时候，都能用金钱换时间。这场直播间的人货场和前期的筹备是花了大量时间和心血的。所有的结果都不是理所应得的，在这个过程里，花钱反而是最简单的事。但是很多人只看到了花钱，所以每天安慰自己，今天小亏换来明天盈利。爱因斯坦说，"持续不断地用同样的方法做同一件事情，却期望得到不同的结果，这就叫荒谬"。在抖音上每天有无数的直播间都在上演这样的场景，每天投放亏钱，却不做任何迭代和优化，只是默默期待明天直播间的流量和转化能变好。这可能吗？醒醒吧。不动脑子没有策略的花钱，是换不来一个明天的。</p>
<p class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-doxcnwmyYAwC6cUAwIjbpjuE0Zb" style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">品牌商家更重要的是实时监控自己直播间的数据，根据数据去优化直播间的人货场，才有可能获取到更多流量，更多的转化。</p>
</div>                        <div style="height: 1px"></div>
                      
</div>
